extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    tnauss

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<java.util.Date> getDateTimeStepsList(java.util.Date startDateTime, java.util.Date endDateTime, long duration)
      This method generates a list of date/time values between a start and end date/time with the increment given by duration in milliseconds.
      static java.util.NavigableMap<java.util.Date,java.util.Date> getDateTimeStepsMap(java.util.Date startDateTime, java.util.Date endDateTime, long duration)
      This method generates a TreeMap of date/time values between a start and end date/time with the increment given by duration in milliseconds.
      static java.util.Date[] getMonthlyTimeSpan(java.util.Date dateTime)
      This method takes a date object and returns the date/time of the beginning and end of the month of this object.
      static java.util.Date mapDate(java.util.Date date, java.util.NavigableMap<java.util.Date,java.util.Date> dateTimeStepsMap)
      This method maps a given date/time to the closest date/time given in a navigable map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateTime

        public DateTime()

    • Method Detail

      • getDateTimeStepsList

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Date> getDateTimeStepsList(java.util.Date startDateTime,
                                                  java.util.Date endDateTime,
                                                  long duration)
                                                           throws java.text.ParseException
        This method generates a list of date/time values between a start and end date/time with the increment given by duration in milliseconds. This method is basically the same as getDateTimeStepsMap except it returns an ArrayList.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • getDateTimeStepsMap

        public static java.util.NavigableMap<java.util.Date,java.util.Date> getDateTimeStepsMap(java.util.Date startDateTime,
                                                                        java.util.Date endDateTime,
                                                                        long duration)
                                                                                 throws java.text.ParseException
        This method generates a TreeMap of date/time values between a start and end date/time with the increment given by duration in milliseconds. This method is basically the same as getDateTimeStepsList except it returns a navigable map.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • getMonthlyTimeSpan

        public static java.util.Date[] getMonthlyTimeSpan(java.util.Date dateTime)
                                           throws java.text.ParseException
        This method takes a date object and returns the date/time of the beginning and end of the month of this object. The time of the first day of the month is set to 00:00:00, the one of the last day is set to 23:59:59.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • mapDate

        public static java.util.Date mapDate(java.util.Date date,
                     java.util.NavigableMap<java.util.Date,java.util.Date> dateTimeStepsMap)
                              throws java.text.ParseException
        This method maps a given date/time to the closest date/time given in a navigable map. One can use getDateTimeStepsMap to generate such a map.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
